ComicInfo.Summary: Sacrifices are never easy... something Gokon can testify to. In a previous life he had all the things worth fighting for, but lost them when he didn't know when to stop fighting. Now the only consolation he can find is at the bottom of a bottle as he regretfully ponders what 'could have been'. This intriguing issue gives insight into the history and weakness of the Echo team's strongest member: Gokon. Meanwhile, as the team anxiously awaits Nina's findings concerning their previous mission, events begin to transpire that may soon put the team into even greater peril.
ComicInfo.Title: Chapter #2: Sacrifices
